headline.main: FRANCE.; Personal, LIterary and Miscellaneous Gossip. Designs of the Allies Against the United States.

docs.lead_paragraph: In July last I mentioned my Belief that a portion of the allied Balde squadron would be sent to take up its Winter quarters in the Cuban or Central American waters. It is not often that an opinion is verified by the event so remarkably us in this case. The vessels of war destined for this topical service are already designated, and are to sail at once.

headline.main: NEW-YORK CITY.; Robbery of a Californian. The Poisoning of Five Persons with Arsenic--The Investigation before Judge Osborne. Serious Affray in Church-Street. Navigating Balloon. The Stranded Ship Vierge Marie. Accident on the Erie Railroad. A Merchant Turned Constable ; Or, Richard's Triumph. The Eighth-avenue Railroad Accident. The Veterans of 1812. Robbery by a Woman. Emigration to Australla. Cost of ?? Another Balloon Ascent. Quickest Trip from New-York to Australia. Deaf Mute Church.

docs.lead_paragraph: A heavy robbery of gold coin and bankable paper was perpetrated in Broadway on the night of the 10th inst., under the following circumstances. docs.lead_paragraph: By the brig Reveille, Capt. BARTLETT, from Laguna, which arrived on Friday, we have dates to Sept. 21. The health of the place was pretty good; everything quiet. On the 16th August, the anniversary of Mexican Independence, the whole population were engaged in the public festivities.

headline.main: LONG ISLAND.; INCENDIARY FIRE IN BROOKLYN.

docs.lead_paragraph: Ten Houses Burned--Accident. A little before 2 o'clock yesterday morning a fire broke out in a block of eight three story frame unfinished buildings on the north side of Gates avenue, between Scbenck and Hunter-streets, which buildings were entirely consumed.

headline.main: NEW-YORK CITY.; Funeral Obsequies of the Late Mrs. Hamilton. CEREMONIES AT TRINITY CHURCH. Extraordinary Longevity--Interesting Funeral Obsequies.. Death of Charles Burke the Comedian. City Mortality. The New-York Sketch Club. The Joseph Walker. Clear the Track. Another know-Nothing Mass Meeting.

docs.lead_paragraph: The funeral obsequies of the late Mrs. ALEX ANDER HAMILTON took place yesterday from Trinity Church. In accordance with the expressed wish of the deceased the ceremonies were confined to the simple rites prescribed by the forms of the Episcopal Church. The body lay in state

headline.main: AN INTERESTING NARRATIVE.; Madame ?? Kessuth. FROM THE SCRAP-BOOK OF A MAOYAR EXILE

docs.lead_paragraph: BROADWAY THEATRE.--Last evening Miss AGNES ROBERTSON took her first benefit in New-York. We are happy to state the house was filled completely. The programme consisted of three pieces, "Andy Blake, or the Irish Diamond," "Used Up," and the "Young Actress." Miss AGNES ROBERTSON appeared in the first and last named pieces.
